EmailTemplate.name: QSOL RENEWAL NOTICE - Fleet Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: QSOL RENEWAL NOTICE - Fleet Customer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear
Our records show that your current subscription of Quickserve is about to expire.
Renewal of your subscription is required for your access to continue, also note your user names could be linked to insite 8 accounts to avoid access issues to QSOL and possibly insite 8 can you please forward your Purchase Order to 1300cummins@cummins.com.
Alternatively you can call 1300 286 646 to renew.
Quickserve Subscription: $ Enter price + GST Part No: CSP4021436
If you require any users added or removed please advise.
For new user please send the word document back filled in.
(See attached file: 1. QSOL Subscription Form.docx) Regards
Cummins Support Centre
Phone (Australia) 1300Cummins Phone (New Zealand) 0800Cummins Fax 1300 286 600 cummins.com 1300cummins@cummins.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail, including any attachments, is for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient(s). If you are not an intended recipient, please do not read, distribute or take action in reliance upon this message. If you have received this in error, please notify the sender immediately by return e-mail and promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system.
